sentences: Oodatu asemel tuli üks teine arst.
Ta on sellele üks kui teine kord mõelnud.
Kassipojal on teine silm alles kinni.
context: The Estonian word 'teine' has multiple related meanings. As an ordinal number, it means 'second'. It can also be used as a pronoun meaning 'another' or 'other', referring to something different from what was previously mentioned or expected. The word declines in cases and has different forms depending on whether it's singular or plural.
